description:
Carry out various works as per tree report Included in application
T1 Apple
T2 Lime TPO 086A T119
T6 Lime TPO 086A  T118
T7 Honey locust TPO 086A T127
T8 Cherry TPO 086A T130
T9 Cherry TPO 086A T129
T11 Sycamore TPO 086A T102
T12 Ash TPO 086A T91

Tree Number - G1
Tree Type - Cypress stumps x2 
Approx Height - 0.3m
Location - Rear of 38 templewood
Service - Fell
Work required - Fell as close to tree's current ground level as possible and leave the stump in the ground. 
Reason - as per clients wishes.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The replacement tree must be planted by April 2025; the trees should be of either Prunus, Betulus, Sorbus, or Amelanchier species, which will be suited to the location. Please do so to avoid a tree replacement notice under section 207 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | If the new tree's species is different from that removed, then Ealing's Planning department must be consulted before planting is completed.
